messages.messageBody:
>So, how does one recover? How does a person heal the wounds of religious
>>abuse? Hopefully, within a caring and understanding new social setting.

I have found a lot of peace in some books, a lot of healing....
One is Deepak Chopra's "The Path to Love" I like a lot of what he says and he
seems to blend and embrace a lot of different religious beliefs (the good
parts of them) and prophets in his writings.
Also Sarah Ban Breathneck's "Simple Abundance" and her follow up book
"Excavating your Authentic Self".
Get those, I can't tell you the healing I've experienced through these books.

Ren
